Text: Public schools are the backbone of our education system but have suffered from chronic underfunding. The #AmericanRescuePlan Act invested nearly $130 billion in our schools. We need to build on this investment to improve our schools for all students. #PublicSchoolsWeek https://t.co/AggVPxkKax

The #AmericanRescuePlan Act temporarily expanded the #ChildTaxCredit - cutting child poverty in half. Since the #CTC expansion expired, child poverty has increased 41%. We should make this tax credit permanent to keep millions of children out of poverty.
https://t.co/scM6fHYcUl

#VladimirPutin is an authoritarian thug who creates chaos & disinformation to maintain his power. Brownfield sites (vacant, polluted industrial sites) damage the health of our communities. 140 million Americans live within 3 miles of one. There are many brownfield sites in #PGH. Home prices have surged since the beginning of the #pandemic, exacerbating a decades-long trend. Since 1965, real home prices have increased 118%, while incomes have increased just 15%. It's past time to #ShowHousingLove & increase federal investments in affordable housing.

The revitalization of Hazelwood is a very positive development, but we must ensure that new investments don't spur gentrification & displace longtime residents. I applaud @urapgh's efforts to promote new housing while keeping Hazelwood affordable. 
https://t.co/gG7LiEuCXB

Americans have had the highest drug prices in the world for decades. It doesn't have to be this way. @HouseDemocrats passed legislation allowing @MedicareGov to negotiate prices. I applaud the #BidenAdministration's work to #lowerdrugprices & urge @SenateDems to pass our bill. https://t.co/TjX9mOu8ge
